meanings.definition: Aperitifs: alcoholic drinks consumed before a meal to stimulate the appetite.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed some refreshing aperitifs before our dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offered a variety of aperitifs to start the meal.
meanings.sent3: The aperitifs were like a tasty preview of the upcoming feast.
meanings.sent4: The aperitifs danced on our taste buds, awakening our hunger.
meanings.sent5: The aperitifs were like a flavorful appetizer for our senses.

meanings.definition: Aperitifs: a small amount of food or drink served before a meal to stimulate the appetite.
meanings.sent1: The hostess served delightful aperitifs to kick off the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: We nibbled on the delicious aperitifs while waiting for the main course.
meanings.sent3: The aperitifs were like a tiny teaser before the grand meal.
meanings.sent4: The aperitifs whispered promises of the culinary delights to come.
meanings.sent5: The aperitifs were a flavorful prelude to the feast ahead.
